item.title: Tiku Talsania critical; actor has suffered a brain stroke, admitted to Kokilaben Dhirubhai Ambani Hospita - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Tiku Talsania critical after brain stroke, hospitalized

Date: Not specified, Source: Times of India

Tiku Talsania, renowned for his comic roles, has been admitted to Kokilaben Dhirubhai Ambani Hospital after suffering a brain stroke. Initial reports erroneously suggested a heart attack was the cause.

  • Tiku Talsania suffered a brain stroke while attending a special screening of a Gujarati film.
  • Industry veteran Rajesh Vasani witnessed the incident and reported on his condition.
  • Talsania has previously spoken about his experiences in the film industry, particularly with Mahesh Bhatt.
  • His latest project, 'Vaar Tahevaar', features Talsania in a comical role.
Rajesh Vasani: "He vomited there, and people around him took him to Kokilaben Dhirubhai Ambani Hospital."

The entertainment industry is rallying support for Talsania as he battles this critical condition.

item.title: Honey Singh Millionaire India Tour 2025: Check Dates, Cities, How To Book Tickets And More - News24
item.description:
Honey Singh Millionaire India Tour 2025

Date & Source: January 11, 2025, News24

Global artiste Honey Singh‚Äôs comeback to the music world was the biggest headline of 2024 with the release of his album ‚ÄòGlory‚Äô. The hit song ‚ÄòMillionaire‚Äô now leads him to tour major cities across India, promising an unforgettable musical experience.

Key Points

  • The tour kicks off in Mumbai on February 22, covering 10 cities including Lucknow, Delhi, Indore, Pune, Ahmedabad, Bengaluru, Chandigarh, Jaipur, and Kolkata.
  • Tickets go live for booking on January 11, 2 pm via District app by Zomato.
  • The concert is a 4-hour event aimed at audiences aged 16 and above, starting at 6 pm.
  • Singh's performances are expected to feature surprises and a significantly upgraded experience compared to his previous shows.
‚ÄúMillionaire Tour is not just a tour, ye meri kahani hai jise abb main aap sabke saath jeeyunga.‚Äù - Honey Singh

Conclusion: Honey Singh aims to redefine live performance expectations in India with his upcoming tour, ensuring fans are in for a treat with new and innovative experiences.

item.title: Tiku Talsania suffers massive heart attack, critical: reports - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Tiku Talsania Suffers Massive Heart Attack, Critical: Reports

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Times of India

Tiku Talsania, 70, is reported to be in critical condition after suffering a massive heart attack. Details on his condition remain scarce.

  • Known for his comedic roles in 90s films like Andaz Apna Apna and Coolie No 1.
  • Reported to be in critical condition according to Telly Chakkar.
  • Previous anecdotes shared by Talsania highlight Mahesh Bhatt's unique filmmaking style.
  • Recently appeared in the film Vaar Tahevaar, directed by Chinmay Purohit.
‚ÄúTu bata camera kaha lagana hai?‚Äù - Tiku Talsania recalling Mahesh Bhatt's unconventional methods.

The news of Talsania‚Äôs heart attack has caused concern among fans and the film industry, with hopes for his recovery.

item.title: Aamir Khan quits smoking: When he said his cigarette smoke affected ex-wife Kiran Rao, but she wasn't ‚Äòaverse‚Äô to pipe - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Aamir Khan Quits Smoking Ahead of Son's Film Release

Date: Jan 11, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Aamir Khan announced on January 11, 2025, that he has quit smoking in preparation for his son Junaid Khan's film, Loveyapa. He explained that he has previously struggled with smoking but is committed to supporting his son during his career launch.

  • Aamir Khan recently quit smoking for his son's film release.
  • He had switched from cigarettes to pipe smoking a few years ago.
  • Kiran Rao, Aamir's ex-wife, was affected by his cigarette smoking but was not averse to pipe smoking.
  • Aamir has had a long history with smoking and has tried cigars but did not enjoy them.
  • He feels a personal sacrifice is needed as a father to support his son.
‚ÄúI quit smoking for two-three years when I was training for Dhoom 3. But then, I went back to it again.‚Äù - Aamir Khan

Aamir Khan's decision to quit smoking reflects his desire to enhance his role as a father as his son begins his film career.

item.title: Game Changer Box Office Collections: Ram Charan and Shankar film underwhelms on first day in India - PINKVILLA
item.description:
Game Changer Box Office Collections: Ram Charan and Shankar film underwhelms on first day in India

Updated on Jan 11, 2025 | Source: Pinkvilla

Game Changer had a disappointing start at the Indian box office, collecting an approximate of Rs. 60 crore on its first day, which is considered underwhelming given the expectations set by its massive budget.

  • The film grossed Rs. 59.50 crore on its opening day.
  • Collections in Telugu states were below expectations, significantly lower than the targeted Rs. 60-65 crore.
  • The Hindi version performed the best with Rs. 7 crore NETT.
  • Low occupancy rates were observed with less than 50% in regular shows.
  • The performance was notably poor in Tamil Nadu and Kerala, traditionally strong markets for director Shankar.
‚ÄúA little salt blends well with flour,‚Äù but here the salt is probably more than flour.

This lackluster performance raises questions about the film's future at the box office, given the high expectations set by its marketing and budget.

item.title: Report: Prabhas‚Äô The Raja Saab gets postponed - 123telugu
item.description:
Prabhas‚Äô The Raja Saab gets postponed

Published on Jan 11, 2025

The upcoming film featuring Prabhas, The Raja Saab, has reportedly been postponed from its initial release date of April 10, 2025. The horror comedy, directed by Maruthi, is currently in its final production stages.

  • The Raja Saab is a horror comedy romantic entertainer.
  • Initial release was set for April 10, 2025, but may not be met.
  • The reason for the delay has not been disclosed.
  • A special poster is expected to be unveiled for Sankranthi.
  • Co-stars include Malavika Mohanan and Niddhi Agerwal.
  • Produced by People Media Factory with music by Thaman.
‚ÄúAn official confirmation from the team will make things clear.‚Äù

This postponement has led to increased speculation, especially following the announcement of another film set to release on the same date.

item.title: Game Changer worldwide box office collection day 1: Ram Charan film opens big, yet over ‚Çπ100 cr behind Pushpa 2 - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Game Changer worldwide box office collection day 1: After earning over ‚Çπ50 crore domestically, the action entertainer earns more than thrice globally.

Date: Jan 11, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

The film "Game Changer," directed by S Shankar and starring Ram Charan and Kiara Advani, has made a spectacular opening at the box office with a worldwide collection of ‚Çπ186 crore on its first day. Despite this impressive debut, it trails significantly behind the blockbuster "Pushpa 2."

  • Game Changer earned ‚Çπ51.25 crore domestically on its opening day.
  • The film is set in the political landscape, following an IAS officer's struggle against corruption.
  • Pushpa 2 had an opening day collection of ‚Çπ294 crore, outpacing Game Changer by over ‚Çπ100 crore.
‚ÄúThe king's arrival is setting the box office ablaze. #GameChanger takes a blockbuster opening at the BOX OFFICE. GROSSES 186 CRORES WORLDWIDE on Day 1.‚Äù

In conclusion, while "Game Changer" shows strong numbers on its opening day, it has a long way to go to match the success of other major Telugu films such as "Pushpa 2."

item.title: Aamir Khan quits smoking: When he asked Shah Rukh Khan if he could smoke in front of Amitabh Bachchan - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Aamir Khan Quits Smoking Ahead of His Son's Film Launch

Jan 11, 2025 by HT Entertainment Desk

Aamir Khan has announced that he has quit smoking, as he prepares for his son Junaid's film. He mentioned that he has enjoyed smoking but felt it was the right time to stop.

  • Aamir made his announcement at the trailer launch of 'Loveyapa'.
  • He recalled a humorous incident about asking Shah Rukh Khan if he could smoke around Amitabh Bachchan.
  • Aamir expressed his desire to set a good example for his son, whose career is just beginning.
‚ÄúI made a resolve in my heart. I'm quitting, whether it (Junaid's next film) works or not, I'm doing this independent of that.‚Äù

This decision reflects Aamir's commitment to being a positive influence on his son's career.

item.title: After Kalki 2898 AD, Jai Hanuman lands in trouble - 123telugu
item.description:
Jai Hanuman Faces Legal Trouble Over Controversial Teaser

Published on Jan 11, 2025

The upcoming film Jai Hanuman is facing backlash due to allegations of misrepresenting Lord Hanuman in its teaser. As legal troubles mount, the producers have yet to respond.

  • A Hyderabad lawyer filed a petition against the makers of Jai Hanuman.
  • The teaser allegedly disrespects Lord Hanuman's image.
  • The production company, Mythri Movie Makers, has not issued a comment yet.
  • Jai Hanuman is a sequel to the successful film Hanu-Man.
‚ÄúThe teaser could mislead future generations about Lord Hanuman‚Äôs image,‚Äù claimed advocate Tirumala Rao.

This controversy highlights the scrutiny faced by mythological films in India, especially regarding their portrayals of religious figures.

item.title: Kiran Rao reveals one of her ‚Äòmain issues‚Äô after she started dating Aamir Khan in early 2000s: ‚ÄòJust didn‚Äôt have the kind of‚Ä¶‚Äô - The Indian Express
item.description:
Kiran Rao reveals one of her ‚Äòmain issues‚Äô after she started dating Aamir Khan in early 2000s: ‚ÄòJust didn‚Äôt have the kind of‚Ä¶‚Äô

Date: January 11, 2025 | Source: The Indian Express

Kiran Rao reflects on her early romance with Aamir Khan, highlighting the simplicity of their communication and her challenges with public appearances due to fashion.

  • The couple began dating during the shooting of 'Swades' in 2004.
  • Kiran felt their relationship was effortless and without the weight of Aamir's stardom.
  • She humorously admitted to needing to update her wardrobe to keep up with public life.
  • Kiran and Aamir married in 2005 and have a son, Azad, born via surrogacy in 2011.
  • Despite their divorce in 2021, they continue to collaborate professionally.
‚ÄúI just didn‚Äôt have the kind of clothes for so many occasions. That was one of the main issues in life.‚Äù

In conclusion, Kiran Rao's interview provides a personal glimpse into her life with Aamir Khan, illustrating both the joys and challenges of navigating a high-profile relationship.

item.title: Karan Johar wears 'nepo baby' T-shirt during dinner with Gauri Khan, Malaika Arora; internet says: It's really on point - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Karan Johar wore 'nepo baby' T-shirt during dinner with Gauri Khan, Malaika Arora; internet says: It's really on point

Date: January 11, 2025

Source: Hindustan Times

Karan Johar garnered attention for wearing a T-shirt that read 'nepo baby' during a dinner outing with friends Gauri Khan and Malaika Arora.

  • Karan wore a full-sleeved white T-shirt with black trousers and sneakers.
  • The dinner took place in Mumbai and was captured on social media.
  • Internet reactions highlighted the pride in Karan's choice of attire, with comments like 'Finally, wearing his Nepo Baby shirt proudly.'
  • In addition to his T-shirt, Karan has been active in the fashion scene, walking the ramp at events.
  • Karan is set to direct a new series for Netflix India and has several films in production.
'Lol, Kjo's top is really on point haan (yes). He's proud to be a new baby.'

In conclusion, Karan Johar's casual yet bold fashion choice sparked a lively discussion on social media, reflecting the ongoing cultural conversation around 'nepo babies' in the film industry.

item.title: WWE SmackDown Match Results, Highlights and Key Moments for January 10, 2025 - Ringside News
item.description:
WWE SmackDown Match Results, Highlights, and Key Moments for January 10, 2025

Publication Date: January 10, 2025 | Source: Ringside News

This week‚Äôs WWE SmackDown delivered an exciting evening of wrestling action from the Moda Center in Portland, Oregon, featuring key title matches and surprise moments.

Key Points:

  • Shinsuke Nakamura defended his United States Championship against LA Knight.
  • Tiffany Stratton made an appearance to celebrate her victory as Women‚Äôs Champion.
  • Cody Rhodes confronted Paul Heyman regarding Roman Reigns' intentions.
  • LA Knight faced an unexpected attack from Jacob Fatu and Tama Tonga, leading to disqualification.
  • Jimmy Uso and Cody Rhodes helped fend off Tama and Fatu after the main event.

Notable Quotes:

‚ÄúIt‚Äôs Tiffy Time!‚Äù - Tiffany Stratton
‚ÄúI‚Äôm ready to settle this tonight!‚Äù - Cody Rhodes

Conclusion: This episode of SmackDown featured intense rivalries and set the stage for future matchups, culminating in unexpected entrances and confrontations that left fans anticipating the next events.

item.title: Madraskaaran Review | This Wannabe Tragedy Causes More Headaches Than Heartache - Lensmen Reviews
item.description:
Madraskaaran Review | This Wannabe Tragedy Causes More Headaches Than Heartache

Publication Date: January 11, 2025

Source: Lensmen Reviews

Madraskaaran, starring Shane Nigam, attempts to evoke empathy as it portrays the trials of its protagonist, but it often falls short due to its bloated narrative and unconvincing emotional triggers.

Key Points:

  • The film centers around Sathya, who faces an emotional crisis after an accident on the eve of his wedding.
  • Director Vaali Mohan Das fails to create genuine empathy for the protagonist, often leading to unintentional humor.
  • The supporting characters are depicted as impulsive, undermining the film's emotional impact.
  • Shane Nigam shows improvement in performance during the tragic sequences compared to the lighter ones.
‚ÄúMadraskaaran is a bloated emotional drama that might touch the hearts of those who are addicted to daily soaps.‚Äù

The film suffers from a lack of subtlety and predictability, leaving audiences weary rather than emotionally invested.

item.title: Pushpa 2 Worldwide Box Office Collection Day 37: Allu Arjun‚Äôs Rs 1831 cr film slows down after Game Changer, hits lowest point since release - The Indian Express
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Worldwide Box Office Collection Day 37

Date: January 11, 2025

Source: The Indian Express

Pushpa 2: The Rule has achieved great success but is now slowing down after facing competition from Game Changer.

  • The film has grossed over Rs 1831 crore worldwide.
  • It is the second-highest Indian grosser of all time, surpassing Baahubali 2.
  • Box office collections have declined with only Rs 1.15 crore on Day 37.
  • Its extended version release is planned for January 17.
  • Pushpa 2 has faced increased competition since the release of Game Changer.
‚ÄúPushpa 2 has started losing its steam at the box office now.‚Äù

The film's performance is influenced by new releases, but it remains a significant achievement in Allu Arjun's career.

item.title: Imran Khan's ex-wife Avantika Malik finally breaks silence after years about the time she got divorced, says - India.com
item.description:
Avantika Malik Opens Up About Divorce from Imran Khan

Publication Date: Not specified | Source: India.com

Avantika Malik, former wife of Imran Khan, recently shared her thoughts about the challenging period following their divorce in 2019.

  • Avantika and Imran initiated their relationship at age 19 and married in 2011.
  • They have one daughter together, Imara Malik Khan.
  • After eight years of marriage, they decided to separate, citing unfixable patterns in their relationship.
  • Avantika described 2019 as the year that ‚Äúbroke‚Äù her but emphasized her journey toward authenticity and self-love.
  • Imran acknowledged the heartbreak of the decision but felt it was necessary for both their personal growth.
‚ÄúI‚Äôm proud of me!‚Äù - Avantika Malik

The discussion highlights the emotional aspects of divorce and the importance of self-discovery and co-parenting.

item.title: Game Changer Worldwide Box Office Collection Day 1: Ram Charan-starrer surpasses Vinaya Vidheya Rama but couldn‚Äôt overtake RRR, earns Rs 51.25 cr - The Indian Express
item.description:
Game Changer Worldwide Box Office Collection Day 1: Ram Charan-starrer earns Rs 186 crore worldwide, claim makers

Date: January 11, 2025 | Source: Indian Express

S Shankar‚Äôs highly anticipated film, Game Changer, starring Ram Charan and Kiara Advani, has taken a strong opening at the box office, with a reported collection of Rs 186 crore worldwide on its first day.

  • Game Changer has grossed Rs 51.25 crore in India.
  • The film's collections include Rs 42 crore in Telugu, Rs 2.1 crore in Tamil, Rs 7 crore in Hindi, along with smaller amounts in Kannada and Malayalam.
  • The movie achieved a morning occupancy rate of 51.32% for the Telugu version and an 82% occupancy for its 4DX Hindi version afternoon shows.
  • This opening surpassed Ram Charan‚Äôs last solo film, Vinaya Vidheya Rama, which earned Rs 34 crore on its opening day.
  • Despite its success, it did not match the Day 1 collection of RRR, which opened at Rs 133 crore.
The king‚Äôs arrival is setting the box office ablaze ü§ôüèº #GameChanger takes a blockbuster opening at the BOX OFFICE üí•üí• GROSSES 186 CRORES WORLDWIDE on Day 1 ‚ù§‚Äçüî•

Director S Shankar hopes to capitalize on this success as his previous film, Indian 2, opened at Rs 25.6 crore.

The film features Ram Charan in a dual role, with Kiara Advani as his love interest. Game Changer is expected to maintain its momentum through the weekend, especially after a dry spell in box office hits.

item.title: Fateh box office collection day 1: Sonu Sood's directorial debut opens at ‚Çπ2.45 cr - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Fateh Box Office Collection Day 1: Sonu Sood's Directorial Debut Opens at ‚Çπ2.45 Cr

Date: Jan 11, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Soon to be a notable directorial debut for actor Sonu Sood, the film Fateh managed to collect ‚Çπ2.45 crore on its opening day, facing competition from the Telugu blockbuster Game Changer.

  • Fateh opened well with a collection of ‚Çπ2.45 crore on its first day.
  • The film competes with Game Changer, which earned ‚Çπ7 crore on its opening day.
  • Tickets were priced at ‚Çπ99 for the first day as part of an initiative to reach the common man.
  • All profits from the film will be donated to charity by Sonu Sood.
  • Fateh is based on real-life instances of cybercrime experienced during the COVID-19 pandemic.
‚ÄúFateh is a film made for the common man, and I wanted it to reach everyone in the most accessible way across India.‚Äù - Sonu Sood

The opening day collection shows promise, and the film's strategy of affordable tickets may boost attendance. With a gripping narrative around cybercrime, Fateh aims to resonate with audiences nationwide.

item.title: Prabhas Getting Married? Trade Analyst Drops BIG Hint, Leaves Fans Excited - News18
item.description:
Prabhas Getting Married? Trade Analyst Drops BIG Hint, Leaves Fans Excited

Published on: January 11, 2025, 14:43 IST | Source: News18

Looks like Telugu star Prabhas is getting married. Recently, trade analyst Manobala Vijayabalan posted a cryptic tweet hinting at a wedding, prompting speculation among fans.

  • Fans are reacting excitedly to the trade analyst's post about Prabhas potentially getting married.
  • There is speculation regarding Prabhas's relationship with his Baahubali co-star Anushka Shetty.
  • Previous rumors of his marriage were dismissed by Prabhas during an event, where he stated he doesn't want to hurt his female fans.
‚ÄúI am not getting married soon because I don‚Äôt want to hurt the feelings of my female fans,‚Äù - Prabhas

The rumors surrounding Prabhas's marriage have sparked significant interest and discussion among fans, as they eagerly await any confirmation.
